name: Bouncing Odyssey
description: A bizarre hand-drawn (on paper with pencil ;) ) logic puzzle game. With Bouncing Odyssey, you'll experience 76 unique and challenging levels in three different worlds with four different physics based mechanics.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 64 bit Processor: Dual-core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD with OpenGL 2.1+ support Storage: 130 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7,  Windows 10, 64 bit Processor: Intel i3 or its AMD equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 2.1+ Storage: 130 MB available space
